title: (x) Avant Garde Gothic, Amost embarassed to ask...
content:
This is probably ridculously easy as it's so widely used, but I can't seem to find it. So.. can someone please tell me the name of the typeface used on this site

[http://www.ironman.vh1.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101216081210/http:/www.ironman.vh1.com/ "http://www.ironman.vh1.com/")

Specifically for the words "TONY STARK"

Thanks in advance!
author: Grok

comments.content: “TONY STARK” is [Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20101216081210/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=avant+garde&x=0&y=0) (with alternates), many versions available
